meanings.definition: Engaging in or characterized by lively and noisy festivities or celebrations.
meanings.sent1: The revelrous crowd danced joyfully at the party.
meanings.sent2: The street was filled with revelrous music and laughter during the festival.
meanings.sent3: The revelrous group of friends sang and danced together all night long.
meanings.sent4: The revelrous atmosphere of the carnival was infectious, spreading joy to all attendees.
meanings.sent5: The revelrous celebration echoed through the town, bringing smiles to everyone's faces.

meanings.definition: Someone who enjoys or participates in revelry.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the revelrous spirit of the group, always bringing energy to the party.
meanings.sent2: The revelrous joined hands and danced around the bonfire in merriment.
meanings.sent3: The revelrous in the room were the first to start the conga line at the wedding.
meanings.sent4: He was a true revelrous, finding joy in every occasion and spreading cheer to others.
meanings.sent5: The revelrous at the event wore colorful costumes and laughed freely, creating a festive atmosphere.
